EmailTemplate.name: RE: touching base (1350928337.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: touching base (1350928337.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Bob, Good to hear from you. Our Security department usually doesn’t come in to play until we receive a DD-254 from your client. If you have questions about the process you can find those details here <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Security_Clearance_Info_Sheet_Generic.pdf>. Otherwise, you may connect with them at security@mbopartners.com <mailto:security@mbopartners.com> It was wonderful meeting you last week and I would love to continue our conversation. You may easily book a time that is convenient for you on my online schedule by going here <https://my.timedriver.com/8SLYS>. You can also watch a short video about who we are on You Tube <http://youtu.be/zKDzwSTmGv4>. I look forward to speaking with you and sharing more information about MBO Partners! Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: bob mikelskas [mailto:rmikelsk@gmail.com] Sent: Monday, October 22, 2012 11:10 AM To: Sara Conde Subject: touching base Sara: I met you at the reception last week. You mentioned that MBOpartners has a security profesional who handles clearances. Can you provide me with his contact info? thanks bob -- Dr. Robert A. Mikelskas President RAM Systems & Technology LLC 1837 Post Oak Trail Reston Virginia 20191 703-606-8827
